entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
